Complete Pixie Move List

By Dark Phoenix on Wednesday, August 1, 2001 - 07:38 pm:

NameTypeRangeGutsStatsNatureNotes
KickBasicShort10E/B/-/--a
High KickBasicShort19D/B/E/E--
Heel RaidHeavyShort30C/D/C/E--
PatBasicShort12E/A/-/--a
SlapBasicShort18D/A/E/---
RaySharpExtreme17D/C/E/C--
MegaraySharpExtreme29D/C/E/B--
GigaraySharpExtreme34C/D/E/SGood-
FlameHeavyExtreme19C/E/D/E--
GigaflameHeavyExtreme30B/E/D/EEvil-
KissWitheringLong18-/B/C/E--
BoltHitLong16E/A/E/E--
LightningHitLong25D/A/E/E--
Phantom ClawHitMid25D/S/E/E-h
1-2 PunchBasicMid15D/S/-/E-k
BangSpecialMid42B/D/D/C--
Big BangSpecialMid46A/E/C/B--
RefreshmentSpecialLong50B/E/-/-Goodb d f
Life StealSpecialLong40C/D/-/-Evilb e g
Fire BreathSpecialLong49A/D/D/E-b i
Death FinalSpecialMid52A/E/A/E-c j


Tech Chains:

Kick (30) -> High Kick (30) -> Heel Raid
Pat(30) -> Slap
Ray (50) -> Megaray (50) -> Gigaray
Flame (50) -> Gigaflame
Bolt (50) -> Lightning
Bang (50) -> Big Bang

Notes:

a - Basic starting move.
b - Requires an INT of 450 or higher.
c - Requires an INT of 500 or higher.
d - Nature must be "Good or better".
e - Nature must be "Worst".
f - Recovers LIF.
g - Drains LIF from opponent.
h - May only be learned by sub-type Kitten (Pixie/Kato)
i - May only be learned by sub-type Daina (Pixie/Dragon)
j - May only be learned by sub-type Lilim (Pixie/Joker)
k - Cannot be learned under normal circumstances. Can possibly be inherited via combining. If you have any additional info on this move, please let me know!
